message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $105.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting close to your target price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $98.
I'm getting close to making a decision, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to pay $92 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I can offer it to you for $95.
I'm not getting any younger, and I really need this product. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $92.5, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I understand your urgency, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I can offer it to you for $97.50.
I've made it to the final round, and I'm not willing to budge any further. I'll make one last offer of $90. If you're not willing to accept it, I'll have to consider buying it from John for $80.
